text: We’re looking for an in-house freelance/employed/permanent (part time or full time) HubSpot certified developer with proven experience in module and theme creation and development on the front end, but also some back end experience with building custom integrations as well as serverless functions and experience using Opps hub and enterprise HubSpot accounts. If you’re interested, please drop me a message with your availability, rate and examples of your experience for immediate consideration. Must be fluent in English with some client facing communication potentially required. UK timezone. References required. NO AGENCIES PLEASE.
<@U03S50GHXMH> I’ve send my portfolio to you a on a direct message.
